data.text:
Mile Name Meaning in English

What does the name Mile mean? What is the meaning of the name Mile, lucky number, lucky stone, origin and religion.

Miles /ˈmaɪlz/ is a male name from the Latin miles, a soldier. The medieval knight was called miles in Medieval Latin, while in Classical Latin, miles meant simply soldier of any sort, including infantry. Miles Gloriosus, whose name means "boastful soldier", was a comic stock character in classical Roman drama.

Mile Name Meaning, Origin & Details

Meaning: Short Info: Miles Davis was an American musician. He was hugely influential in Jazz music from the 1940's up until his death in 1991. Details: From the Latin mediaeval name Milo, of uncertain origin, but possibly linked to the Latin miles, meaning "soldier", or the Slavonic element mil, meaning "favour, grace". Gender: Boy Religion: Christian Suitable for: Boys / Male / Guys Hardness: Easy to pronounce, Mile is a short name Uniqueness: It is a common name Short & Easy: Yes Syllables: 4 Letters and 1 Words
